name: pacem
description: Pacem JS is a CustomElements-v1 based implementation of a javascript webcomponent ecosystem.

scripts.build: npm run build-core && npm run build-ui && npm run build-logging && npm run build-maps && npm run build-scaffolding && npm run build-3d && npm run build-charts && npm run build-plus && npm run build-fx
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify-core && npm run uglify-ui && npm run uglify-logging && npm run uglify-maps && npm run uglify-scaffolding && npm run uglify-3d && npm run uglify-charts && npm run uglify-plus && npm run uglify-fx
scripts.build-prod: npm run clean-js && npm run clean-css && npm run build && npm run uglify && npm run build-css-dark && npm run build-css-light && npm run build-css-phousys && npm run header && npm run copyfiles
scripts.build-css-demo-dark: lessc --clean-css demo/less/docs.less wwwroot/dist/css/pacem-docs-dark.min.css && lessc --clean-css --modify-var="tag_prefix=foo" src/less/pacem/pacem.less wwwroot/dist/css/foo-dark.min.css && lessc --clean-css --modify-var="tag_prefix=foo" demo/less/docs.less wwwroot/dist/css/foo-docs-dark.min.css
scripts.build-css-demo-light: lessc --clean-css --modify-var="theme=theme-light" demo/less/docs.less wwwroot/dist/css/pacem-docs-light.min.css && lessc --clean-css --modify-var="tag_prefix=foo" --modify-var="fonts=fonts-light" --modify-var="theme=theme-light" src/less/pacem/pacem.less wwwroot/dist/css/foo-light.min.css && lessc --clean-css --modify-var="tag_prefix=foo" --modify-var="theme=theme-light" demo/less/docs.less wwwroot/dist/css/foo-docs-light.min.css
scripts.build-css-demo-phousys: lessc --clean-css --modify-var="theme=theme-phousys" demo/less/docs.less wwwroot/dist/css/pacem-docs-phousys.min.css && lessc --clean-css --modify-var="tag_prefix=foo" --modify-var="fonts=fonts-phousys" --modify-var="theme=theme-phousys" src/less/pacem/pacem.less wwwroot/dist/css/foo-phousys.min.css && lessc --clean-css --modify-var="tag_prefix=foo" --modify-var="theme=theme-phousys" demo/less/docs.less wwwroot/dist/css/foo-docs-phousys.min.css
scripts.build-css-alldev: npm run build-css-dark && npm run build-css-light && npm run build-css-phousys && npm run build-css-demo-dark && npm run build-css-demo-light && npm run build-css-demo-phousys && npm run copyfiles
scripts.build-demo-prod: npm run build-demo && npm run build-css-demo-dark && npm run build-css-demo-light && npm run build-css-demo-phousys
scripts.copyfiles: copyfiles -f src/polyfills/*.* dist/js/polyfills && copyfiles dist/**/*.* wwwroot
scripts.docs: typedoc --out wwwroot/typedoc/ --target ES6 --excludeExternals --excludePrivate && typedoc --json wwwroot/typedoc/core.json --target ES6 --excludeExternals --excludePrivate
